scanError.message: Communication with deviantART was unsuccessful. If you close and re-open this pop-up, you might have better luck next time.

tipOfTheMoment1.message: Love a random deviant (but don't be creepy).

tipOfTheMoment2.message: You can show your love for Deviant Love at its deviation page.

tipOfTheMoment3.message: There's lots of love-worthy art to be found at Daily Deviations.
